experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Feature Development: Create new features for web and mobile apps using React and React Native, ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices.
Bug Fixing: Identify and resolve issues promptly to maintain application stability and user satisfaction
Version Control: Utilize Git for version control, managing branches effectively and ensuring code consistency across the team
Deployment Automation: Implement CI/CD pipelines to automate build, test, and deployment processes, ensuring reliable deployments across environments.
Security and Performance Optimization: Prioritize security measures and optimize performance to safeguard user data and deliver a seamless user experience.

experience.title: React Native Developer
description: Complex Application Development: Design and develop robust, scalable, and sustainable applications, ensuring they are adaptable to future requirements.
Reusable Components: Create and maintain reusable components to streamline development, standardize UI elements, and ensure consistency across views.
Service Integration: Integrate and manage services like Firebase for continuous error tracking and improved stability and performance.
Architectural Optimization: Optimize and modularize internal architecture, focusing on clean code and well-defined modules to enhance long-term maintainability and scalability.

experience.title: Front End Lead
description: Web and App Development: Develop websites and applications using modern frameworks such as React.js, React Native, and Next.js, creating efficient and scalable solutions tailored to customer needs.
Reusable Components: Design and implement reusable and dynamic components, standardizing the construction of websites and applications to enhance consistency and accelerate development.
Maintenance and Troubleshooting: Maintain and troubleshoot websites and applications, ensuring optimal performance and delivering a smooth user experience with quick and effective solutions.
Version Control: Manage development tools like GitHub, Git, and Azure, coordinating version control to facilitate team collaboration throughout the project lifecycle.
Technical Support: Provide technical support and resolve bugs, delivering fast fixes to maintain the stability and reliability of applications and websites.
Deployment: Implement and deploy applications and websites on servers, ensuring proper configuration and optimal performance for end users.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Web Views Development: Develop web views using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, creating visually appealing and functional interfaces that adhere to current standards and deliver an optimal user experience.
Template Structuring: Structure base templates for websites, establishing a solid foundation for content and additional functionalities, ensuring consistency and scalability.
Component Creation and Modification: Create and modify website components, adapting and optimizing elements according to project requirements to improve performance and integration.
Client Requirement Fulfillment: Accurately fulfill client requirements, ensuring solutions align with expectations, delivered on time, and supported by clear communication throughout the process.
